channel.title: Full wildy
channel.description:
ok, i have been working on full wildy and i'm stuck on a few things.
1. How do i add multi skulls on the bottom right hand of screen?
2. if your not skulled how to i make it so if you keep 3 items and when your skulled you lose all and if protect items is on you keep 1?
[URL=http://r00nsc4p3.smfforfree4.com][IMG]http://img398.imageshack.us/img398/6644/skullstf2.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Full wildy
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

what am i doing wrong it still doesn’t work. public void keepItem1() { for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { int highest = 0; int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i)); if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) { highest = value; keepItem = playerItems[i]-1; keepItemAmount = playerItemsN[i]; } } }

[quote=“Luke132, post:4, topic:190602”]ok fair enough, for protect item, look at your keepitem voids, youll be able to work it out.

for the crossed swords, find the frame and add it the same way.[/quote] do you know what frame it is?

Read full topic
